clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Collapse of pleural space lobe with volume loss.
Fibrotic changes with honeycombing in pleural space.
Pulmonary embolism suspected; filling defect in segmental artery of pleural space.
Pleural effusion on the pleural space side, moderate in size.
Small pneumothorax on the pleural space side.
